reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a find! This B&B fully lived up to the excellent reviews. It is very well situated in the centre of town, near some good restaurants and pubs. The rooms are large and very comfortable and the house is beautiful. It is all you could ever ask of a Bed and Breakfast, the hosts are welcoming and helpful and the breakfasts good quality and filling. So pleased we stayed here!
reviews.title: A wonderful B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the B&B as we drove through Bourton. We were shown two rooms that were vacant and chose the room in the main house. A large relaxing room with ensuite. Hosts very pleasant and eager to make our stay, just one night, special. Breakfast in a communal dining room with other guests was brilliant. On leaving hosts spent time advising us where we should tour with just 4 days to see parts of Britain
reviews.title: A Great B&B at Bourton-on-the-water

reviews.text: Just a minutes walk to the centre of Bourton-on-the-water
reviews.title: Very nice stay in Bourton-on-the-Water

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our 2 nights stay at Manor Close in mid June 2013 was very enjoyable. I found our B&B (the “Manor Close”) in a fun way, by taking a “virtual walk” along Bourton’s High Street on Google street view and noticing a beautiful old building with a B&B sign - that was all it took for me to decide to contact the owners and I never regretted choosing this particular place. We liked just about everything about it – great location, very pretty and comfortable room (on the 2nd floor by American count, in the cottage), spacious bathroom with good shower, beautiful gardens...
reviews.title: Excellent B & B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners, Joe and Sheena were very nice and friendly, fed us well (full English breakfast) and not only directed us to most picturesque trails but also provided us with a foothpaths map of the area for our beautiful walk to the Upper and Lower Slaughters next day.
reviews.title: Beautiful Cotswold Village B&B
